AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Acolyte
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an acolyte of the bloody god of the Revia. [PAWN_pronoun] often sacrifices animals, humanlikes or any other living creature that [Pawn_pronoun] can get a hold of. Despite having the fiery fervour to deliver truly gripping sermons, [Pawn_possessive] is often shunned by animals and humans alike, perhaps fearing that they would be next on the altar.
